entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 11.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
